nodes.text: Organarms was a Rebel Alliance Deep Space Manufacturing Facility during the Galactic Civil War. The space station was destroyed by the Galactic Empire with a Missile Boat during the Battle of Organarms.
Organarms first appeared in the first Missile Boat combat training mission, "Dual Warheads," of the Defender of the Empire expansion pack of the 1994 computer game Star Wars: TIE Fighter.
